title: Baby Taylor Winter Skin Care
description: It snowed a lot this winter. Taylor and friends want to have a snowball fight and make a snowman. Oh! it's too cold outside. She needs to have a warm bath. How a about a princess bath? Let’s prepare fragrant essential oils and petals for her. Have a good time!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Shootup.io
description: Shootup.io is a zombie shooter game. You find yourself stranded in a mysterious town. Bad luck, it's infected with zombies. There's only one solution for you... SHOOT'EM ALL! Build a base or squash the zombies with your vehicle. Team up with your friends or fight the other survivors Unlock bonus, ammunition, turrets, landmines... What's your high score gonna be? You can team up with your friends by sharing the link on the button "Team with your friends".
instructions: If you shoot or enter in a car, zombies will hear you and will chase you Find items on the ground or by destroying houses Each 100 zombies killed, you can unlock an upgrade or a new building If your car is stuck, remember to drift (Shift) COMMANDS Movement: W, A, S, D or Arrow keys Shoot: Left click Place a building: Right click / B Interact: SPACE Run / Drift in car: Shift Change weapon: Number / Click on it/ Mouse Wheel Change building: Click on it

title: Animal Happy Drive Coloring
description: Animal Happy Drive Coloring is a free online coloring and kids game! In this game you will find eight different pictures which have to be colored as fast as you can to obtain a great score at the end of the game. You have 23 different colors to choose. You can also save the colored image. Have fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play or tap on the screen!

title: Clash of Skulls
description: Clash of Skulls is real time strategy units deployment game. Objective is to destroy the opponent base by deploying the skulls. Try different combination of units to make effective attack force. Selecting the right units at appropriate time is best way to win the battle. Good Luck
instructions: Tap on cards to deploy units

title: Mini Truck Driver Master
description: Here is a relaxing but hard-core car avoiding arcade game that is made from 3D pixel game art animation. It is managed for you to drive as long distance as you can in a traffic jam. Don't forget to use the coins you win to unlock more vehicles even a tank！
instructions: Tap - gas, Slide - change the track

title: Learning Farm Animals: Educational Games For Kids
description: Farm animals are cute, happy and funny! Our interactive educational games for kids kindergarten are creative and help children develop fine motor skills while learning about domestic animals that live on the farm!
instructions: Use mouse to play.

title: Mini Cart Racing
description: Aim for time run! Race to increase your speed, become master for your map and improve your skills! Use carefully your card and be the best racer in the world!
instructions: Just click to play and use WASD / Arrow keys to drive.

title: Ninja Run
description: Run without falling and avoid the obstacles.
instructions: click/tap on the screen or press keyboard space bar.

title: Tiny Princess
description: Create the cutest tiny princess. This game unites pixel art and chibi anime style. There are 20 characteristics to modify! Choose from a variety of pastel and bright colors.
instructions: Click on buttons to change categories

title: City Bus Racing Game
description: Do you love bus games or bus simulator games? If yes then you are on the app page we have best off-road bus game. This game having amazing different tracks on hills and street. You will really our city bus game. So get ready yourself and download our free bus simulator games, don’t forget share your friends circle you really love simulator games
instructions: hit play button press left and right button to control the bus

title: Racing Cars Memory
description: Racing Cars Memory is a free online game from genre of memory and monsters truck games. Flip the tiles and try to match them up in pairs. Pair up all the tiles to win. Try to complete the game in as few moves as possible! There are is 4 levels. Use mouse to click or tap to screen on the squares. Concentrate yourself and start to play. Enjoy!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Penalty Shoot
description: Interesting soccer kids game. Aim is to shoot penalty and won this game. Try to be beater than goalkeeper and get more scores before you lose 3 balls. Use mouse to soot and aim, or your finger on your screen. Heave fun.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Princess Makeup Salon
description: The little mermaid lives in the palace of the deep ocean. She fell in love with a human prince when the first time she saw him. Today is the prince’s birthday. He invites the mermaid princess to attend the party. Can you help the mermaid princess to get ready for the party and dress beautifully? Enjoy a relaxing spa to lightening her skin. Apply her fashionable makeup and choose perfect outfit for her.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Trivial.io
description: Trivial.io is a trivia game with multiple players trying to answer questions correctly to stay onboard! Answer as many questions as you can to be the last & smartest one!
instructions: Click on the correct answer to move your character in the safe zone. Your player will be safe when you answer correctly. If the answer is incorrect, your character will fall down the stage.

title: SlingShot
description: Hey, Are you looking for a fun game? SlingShot is a fun casual game. Whether you play against artificial intelligence with 1 player mode or fight your friends with 2, 3, 4 player modes. Your goal is to pass all the disks in the region to the opposite side. SlingShot game with fun and beautiful animation graphics.
instructions: Player 1 = W, Player 2 = G, Player 3 = K, Player 4 = P

title: Onet Fruit Classic
description: Onet Fruit Classic is a fun and relaxing pair puzzle solving game.
instructions: ★The goal of the game Onet Fruit Classic is to remove all tiles from the board by matching pairs of identical tiles. ★ Match tiles with the same fruit and they will disappear.

title: Super Dash Car
description: Control your car, jump madness overtaking, overtaking on the road to enjoy the speed and passion.
instructions: Control your car, jump madness overtaking, overtaking on the road to enjoy the speed and passion.

title: Cold Drink Mahjong Connection
description: Connect all the cold drink mahjong tiles and clear the board in this html5 mahjong connection games. You can only connect 2 tiles with the same items with a path with no more than two 90 degree angles. What's the max level can you play?
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 mahjong games.

title: Drag Kart
description: Drive karting the best you can. 4 different karts in this skill game. Use your finger to control kar in this great drifting game. Stay on track and make best resault.

title: Fashion Blogger
description: If you like fashion challenge games and you enjoy taking selfies, Fashion Blogger : Selfie Contest Games is the place for you. Join our awesome community of fashion bloggers and fashionista games for girls. Show your creativity or hire a personal fashion stylist. Win the selfie contest challenge and become a fashion blogger celebrity. Rule the social media with the best dress up makeup and hair games. Take part in photo shootings and social media selfie contest!

title: Baby Taylor Princess Cosplay Party
description: Taylor's school is hosting a masquerade, and everyone can dress up as their favorite character. Taylor and Jessica like the most beautiful princesses. They decided to dress up as princesses and go to the party. Taylor and Jessica are going to buy clothes first, join them quickly and then help them make up and dress up.

title: Moto Bike Attack Race Master
description: Here is a motorcycle racing which is actually a violent motorcycle game with 3D game art animation. You are allowed to pick up weapons and use them to strike the other racers down from their bikes on the truck. Why not get on the bike and pick a fight?

title: Real MTB Downhill 3D
description: Real MTB Downhill 3D game is an adventurous simulation on different mountain roads. Try to complete 5 different roads in the game before time runs out! You have to ride the bike in different weather conditions and difficult terrains! ou can change the color of the bike with the rewards you win. Also new riding clothes will be waiting for you.
instructions: Game Controls: "ARROW KEYS", "SPACE", "C", "V"

title: Pop The Sugar
description: Pop as many sugar cubes as you can. Some sugar cubes are harder to pop compared to others. Don't run out of time! Features: - Increasing difficulty - Fancy brown and white sugar cubes? We have both! - Entertaining music and sound effects - Endless gameplay
instructions: How many sugar cubes can you pop?

title: ATV Rush
description: ATV Rush is racing speed game with ATV where you need to collect coins and to avoid obstacles. As time goes on, the speed of the vehicle increases so it will be more harder for you to drive. You have 3 lives in this game. Try to get the highest score during your driving adventure.
instructions: Tap on screen to drive or use arrow keys.

title: Mega Ramp Stunt Cars
description: Mega Ramp Stunt Cars is an adventurous driving game developed by CoolMathGamesKids.com team. Drive your car on some tricky and dangerous track performing some impossible stunts. Choose vehicle and gear up the car to show your racing skill on those mega ramps.
instructions: ASWD/Arrow Keys - Drive, F - Speed Booster

title: Fashion Competition
description: Be trendy and stylish – get ready for the fashion contest! You have to be beautiful from head to toe. Get a complete fashion makeover and enjoy being a beauty queen. Start with a face care and then put makeup on, get a new hair makeover and dress to impress the fashion judge. Play Dress Up Battle – Makeup And Fashion Competition game for girls and become a top model, trendy stylist or a fashion designer.

Enjoy the game!

title: Kawaii Jump

How high can you go? Features: - Unlock kawaii characters such a Cow, Bear, Buffalo, Whale, Unicorn, Shark, Goat, Dino and more - Collect powerups such as extra time, combo points, Trampoline, Safe Zone and more! - Beautiful theme - Addictive music that's hard to forget - Easy to play, hard to master

title: DOP Draw One Part
description: Guess and draw in DOP Draw One Part! This is a game that tests your drawing and puzzle skills. You have to look at the image and figure out what is missing. Then you have to draw the missing part with your finger or mouse. You can use unlimited hints if you get stuck. DOP: Draw One Part is a game that has fun and colorful cartoon graphics and animation. It has many levels to keep you entertained and challenged. How many levels can you solve? Play now and find out
instructions: Tap to draw.

title: Fun Race 3D
description: Fun Race 3D is a cool and interesting 3D racing game, you need to control your character to run in this dangerous place. title: Party.io
description: In the 3D multiplayer game Party.io, all players will fight on the same platform. Once thrown out of the platform, they will fail. If you are attacked, you will faint. If you faint, you will be thrown out. So attack other players and don't make them hit you. React faster to win the war, have fun in the Party.io!

title: Polygon Drift: Endless Traffic Racing
description: ENDLESS TRAFFIC RACER Polygon Drift is unique traffic game, which combines your drifting and racing skills in an arcade drift game, that takes place among regular road traffic. But be careful, because every collision with different car or an obstacle means an end to your ride and you've to start over again!
instructions: nique traffic racer game with stylized polygon graphics - arcade car controls - six racing cars with different performance and controls - two tracks with different weather conditions - drifting among cars in regular traffic

title: Car Race Champ
description: Car Racing Champ is One of best real circuit racing game to grant you best experience of circuit racing and chasing other super cars along with your selected super car. it'll be harsh like driving in an exceedingly single line you would like to push your car with maximum power , you wish to create maximum drifts and you wish to form right balance between power and grip while staying in your class and you are feeling that this can be one best racing game.

This season violet decides to surprise her best friends, parents and boy friend by putting up an exquisite photo shoot. Violet wants to display extra ordinary fashion in anime & social media trends and get a lot of followers.
